---

description: "Query the group information that a user has joined."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/User/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Query group information of user joined</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Query the group information that a user has joined.

<Note title="QPS Limit">20 times/s</Note>
